column4: The Ramones were an American punk rock band formed in New York City in 1974.
The Sex Pistols were an English punk rock band formed in London in 1972.
The Clash were an English punk rock band formed in London in 1976.
Dead Kennedys were an American punk rock band formed in San Francisco in 1978.

column5: The Misfits are an American punk rock band formed in Lodi
Black Flag were an American punk rock band formed in Hermosa Beach
The Buzzcocks were an English punk rock band formed in Bolton

column4: The Damned were an English punk rock band formed in London in 1976.
X were an American punk rock band formed in Los Angeles in 1977.

column5: Bad Brains are an American punk rock band formed in Washington
